Package LAB_03

Class motorBoat

java.lang.Object
LAB_03.ShlupkaAbs
LAB_03.motorBoat
All Implemented Interfaces:
interfaces.Flue, interfaces.Powered
public class motorBoat extends ShlupkaAbs implements interfaces.Flue, interfaces.Powered
Class MotorBoat extends the abstract ShlupkaAbs and represents a motorized boat. It implements the Powered and Flue interfaces to manage engine operations and fuel.

  • Constructor Details

    • motorBoat

      public motorBoat() throws FileNotFoundException
      Default constructor. Creates a MotorBoat with engine off and zero fuel.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created

    • motorBoat

      public motorBoat(int countOars, String material, double length, double width, int countSeats, String nameFile, boolean engineRunning, double fuelLiters, double speedMS) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor with parameters to create a MotorBoat with specific configuration.
      Parameters:
      countOars - number of oars
      material - hull material
      length - hull length in meters
      width - hull width in meters
      countSeats - number of seats
      nameFile - name of the log file
      engineRunning - initial engine state
      fuelLiters - initial fuel amount
      speedMS - initial speed in meters per second (not used in this example)
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created

  • Method Details

    • moveBoat

      public void moveBoat(double distanceMetres)
      Moves the boat a specified distance if the engine is running and there is enough fuel. Consumes 1 liter of fuel per meter moved.
      Specified by:
      moveBoat in class ShlupkaAbs
      Parameters:
      distanceMetres - distance to move in meters

    • startEngine

      public void startEngine()
      Starts the boat's engine.
      Specified by:
      startEngine in interface interfaces.Powered

    • stopEngine

      public void stopEngine()
      Stops the boat's engine.
      Specified by:
      stopEngine in interface interfaces.Powered

    • checkFlue

      public void checkFlue()
      Prints the current fuel level to the log file.
      Specified by:
      checkFlue in interface interfaces.Flue

    • Refueling

      public void Refueling(double countFlue)
      Refuels the boat by a specified amount.
      Specified by:
      Refueling in interface interfaces.Flue
      Parameters:
      countFlue - amount of fuel to add in liters
